info.title: Procurement-Related Task
info.description: This service  enables you to create, update and delete  procurement-related tasks from or within  the SAP S/4HANA system through an API  call.

x-sap-shortText: Read, update and delete procurement-related tasks from or in the SAP S/4HANA system using this service

values.text: [Activity Management in Procurement (19C)](https://rapid.sap.com/bp/#/scopeitems/19C " Link To BP ")

parameters.name: SuplrActyTaskUUID
parameters.description:

(Value needs to be enclosed in single quotes and prefixed with `guid`, e.g. `guid'01234567-0123-0123-0123-0123456789ab'`)

schema.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET A_SuplrActyTskActyReference HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--

EmailAddress.title: Email Address
EmailAddress.description:
Internet mail address, also called e-mail address.  
Example: user.name@company.comThe Internet mail address is used to send mail via the Internet world-wide; the protocol used is SMTP (Simple Mail Transfer Protocol).The Internet mail address format is specified in various RFCs (Internet Request for Comment), including RFCs 821 and 822.This is not an IP address (192.56.30.6).
